properties.name: calendar
properties.description: Google Calendar to operate on

properties.name: timeMin
properties.description: Start of the interval

properties.name: timeMax
properties.description: End of the interval

properties.name: options
properties.description: Returns if there are any events in the given time or not

properties.name: Booked Slots
properties.description: Returns the booked slots

properties.name: RAW
properties.description: Returns the RAW data from the API

properties.name: timezone
properties.description: Time zone used in the response. By default n8n timezone is used.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: If a time-slot is available in a calendar

properties.name: start
properties.description: Start time of the event

properties.name: end
properties.description: End time of the event

properties.name: attendees
properties.description: The attendees of the event. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: conferenceDataUi
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: guestsCanInviteOthers
properties.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can invite others to the event

properties.name: guestsCanModify
properties.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can modify the event

properties.name: guestsCanSeeOtherGuests
properties.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can see who the event's attendees are

properties.name: location
properties.description: Geographic location of the event as free-form text

properties.name: maxAttendees
properties.description: The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.

properties.name: rrule
properties.description: Recurrence rule. When set, the parameters Repeat Frequency, Repeat How Many Times and Repeat Until are ignored.

properties.name: sendUpdates
properties.description: Notifications are sent to all guests

properties.name: External Only
properties.description: Notifications are sent to non-Google Calendar guests only

properties.name: None
properties.description: No notifications are sent. This value should only be used for migration use case.

properties.name: showMeAs
properties.description: The event does not block time on the calendar

properties.name: Busy
properties.description: The event does block time on the calendar

properties.name: summary
properties.description: Title of the event

properties.name: visibility
properties.description: The event is private. This value is provided for compatibility reasons.

properties.name: Default
properties.description: Uses the default visibility for events on the calendar

properties.name: Private
properties.description: The event is private and only event attendees may view event details

properties.name: Public
properties.description: The event is public and event details are visible to all readers of the calendar

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: Time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Specify fields to return, by default a predefined by Google set of commonly used fields would be returned. To return all fields, use '*', more info.

properties.name: iCalUID
properties.description: Specifies event ID in the iCalendar format to be included in the response

properties.name: orderBy
properties.description: Order by the start date/time (ascending). This is only available when querying single events (i.e. the parameter singleEvents is True).

properties.name: Updated
properties.description: Order by last modification time (ascending)

properties.name: query
properties.description: Free text search terms to find events that match these terms in any field, except for extended properties

properties.name: showDeleted
properties.description: Whether to include deleted events (with status equals "cancelled") in the result

properties.name: showHiddenInvitations
properties.description: Whether to include hidden invitations in the result

properties.name: singleEvents
properties.description: Whether to expand recurring events into instances and only return single one-off events and instances of recurring events, but not the underlying recurring events themselves

properties.name: updatedMin
properties.description: Lower bound for an event's last modification time (as a RFC3339 timestamp) to filter by. When specified, entries deleted since this time will always be included regardless of showDeleted.

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete an event

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Retrieve an event

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Retrieve many events from a calendar

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update an event

properties.name: useN8nTimeZone
properties.displayName: This node will use the time zone set in n8n’s settings, but you can override this in the workflow settings
